name: GSI
description:
Grupo de Soluciones Informáticas is a business solutions integration company, being the leader in document administration systems. GSI has regional presence in all Central America, and representatives in Ecuador, Dominican Republic, and Puerto Rico.
GSI solutions are based on the experience and knowledge accumulated for more than 18 years in the market, as a result of constant updates and investigations, GSI offers innovative products and high aggregated value services.

locations.address: Ave. José Agustín Arango Juan Díaz, Plaza Los Pinos
